scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=aaelink-backend && npm run build --workspace=@aaelink/frontend
scripts.build:enterprise: npm run build --workspace=aaelink-enterprise-backend && npm run build --workspace=aaelink-enterprise-frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=aaelink-backend && npm run test --workspace=@aaelink/frontend
scripts.test:enterprise: npm run test --workspace=aaelink-enterprise-backend && npm run test --workspace=aaelink-enterprise-frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=aaelink-backend && npm run lint --workspace=@aaelink/frontend
scripts.lint:enterprise: npm run lint --workspace=aaelink-enterprise-backend && npm run lint --workspace=aaelink-enterprise-frontend
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/frontend && npm run typecheck && cd ../../aaelink-backend && npm run typecheck
scripts.typecheck:enterprise: cd aaelink-enterprise-frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../aaelink-enterprise-backend && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist aaelink-*/node_modules aaelink-*/dist
